alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 10:10PM CDT until April 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... West central Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1010 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Etowah, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tecumseh, Maud, Earlsboro, Tribbey, St. Louis, Etowah, Brooksville, Macomb and Harjo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
